1.title: Shining Light on Role Model, Inner City Service

episode of.title: Shining Light: First United Methodist Temple, TX (digital TV channel) (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: The First United Methodist Church of Temple, Texas serves the inner city with innovative, effective, role-modeling assistance for the restoration of souls and bodies of individuals and families. These provisions include food and housing, as well as comprehensive renewing help in partnership with other inner-city organizations and churches for those who are struggling that include the homeless, sex-trafficked, veterans and others with the following: safety, health care, therapy, employment helps, care for children and much more.

2.title: Shining Light on State-International Outreach, Relief

episode of.title: Shining Light: First United Methodist Temple, TX (digital TV channel) (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: The First United Methodist Church of Temple, TX is involved in state-international service, outreach, and disaster relief projects.

3.title: Shining Light on World-Wide Media

episode of.title: Shining Light: First United Methodist Temple, TX (digital TV channel) (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: FUMC of Temple, TX provides positive contributions to local-international media: print and online magazines, newspapers, and other publications; social media; radio; TV ; movies and more for the eternal good of our world.

4.title: Shining Light on Bible-Centered, Christian Education

episode of.title: Shining Light: First United Methodist Temple, TX (digital TV channel) (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: FUMC of Temple, TX provides a broad range of Bible-centered, Christian education for all ages: Lay Training, Bible Studies, Sunday School, Pre-School, Vacation Bible School and more.

5.title: Shining Light on the Life of the Church

episode of.title: Shining Light: First United Methodist Temple, TX (digital TV channel) (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: The life of FUMC provides many ministries to all ages: traditional and contemporary worship services; Mothers' Day Out/Parents Night Out; music and arts groups/ministries; prayer groups/breakfasts/constructing prayer blankets; food pantry; services for the hospitalized/facility-bound/home-bound, youth group, holiday festivities, library, museum, Biblical storying for healing heart-wounds/building community and more.

6.title: Shining Light on Connecting with the Community

episode of.title: Shining Light: First United Methodist Temple, TX (digital TV channel) (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: The First United Methodist Church of Temple, TX is actively and vitally involved with community organizations and activities: other churches; scouting; schools; parades; and services to the homeless, marginalized, disabled and sex-trafficked.

7.title: Shining Light on Architecture, Facilities of the Church

episode of.title: Shining Light: First United Methodist Temple, TX (digital TV channel) (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: FUMC has beautiful grounds, facilities, architecture to serve its people and community. Around the main sanctuary are luminous stained glass windows that tell the life stories of Christ and his apostles. There are also wonderful sculptures on the campus and in the church. There are other works of art throughout the church that inspire Christian faith.

imdb.plot outline: The First United Methodist Church's "Shining Light" digital TV series shows and documents how this friendly, loving church is vitally and vibrantly serving individuals and families in the inner city of Temple, Texas with innovative, effective, role-modeling programs that include excellent Biblical teaching; prayer ministries; youth and family projects; local to foreign missions service; a Christian pre-school; Mom's Day Out, Parents' Nights Out; the best in traditional and contemporary music; as well as provisions of food, health care, housing and more for the restoration of souls and bodies of individuals and families that include the homeless, veterans, sex-trafficked and more.
imdb.title: Shining Light: First United Methodist Temple, TX (digital TV channel)
